meanings.sent3: The shuras had a heated debate over which color to paint the community center.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a shuras of conflicting thoughts, each vying for attention.
meanings.sent5: The image of the shuras sitting in a circle, deep in discussion, was etched in his memory.
